function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 in tourism destinations due to reduced risk perception and information mismanagement","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission leading to outbreaks in tourism destinations","Mitigation":"Implement accurate and efficient information management strategies, and increase awareness of risk perceptions among potential tourists","Technologies":"Digital communication tools, data analytics for monitoring risk perception, information management systems","People":"Tourists, local residents, tourism industry workers","Owner":"Tourism organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Negative influence on country and destination image due to misinformation and racial references related to COVID-19","Impact":"Damage to China's country image and tourism destination image, leading to reduced tourist interest","Mitigation":"Address misinformation, promote positive image, and educate communication channels on responsible reporting","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, public relations and communication strategies, education and training programs","People":"Chinese nationals, tourists, tourism industry workers","Owner":"Tourism organizations, Chinese government, international communication channels"},{"Description":"Lack of detail-oriented behavior and increased spontaneous trait inferences leading to risk of epidemic spread","Impact":"Reduced attention to important details, increased likelihood of epidemic outbreaks due to negligence","Mitigation":"Promote detail-oriented behavior through awareness campaigns, education, and training","Technologies":"Education and training programs, behavior monitoring tools","People":"General public, tourists, local residents","Owner":"Education institutions, government health agencies"}]}
